raw_body: DIAS BANDARANAIKE,​ LAKSHMI (nee JAYASUNDARA). Loving wife of the LATE Hon. Felix Dias Bandaranaike,​ and loving mother of Christine. mother in law of Avindra Rodrigo and grandmother of Chalya and Jaana. Loving sister of late Manel de Alwis,​ Nissanka (Noj) Jayasundera,​ Malkanthie Wikramanayaka,​ and Indrani Hewitt,​ passed away at home peacefully. Viewing at home,​ on Sunday,​ 27 August 10 am,​ funeral arrangements to be notified.053874
